channel.title: Banning and Punishment
channel.description:
even though i was banned, i fully understand that i was throwing the game. i'm not complaining im here to say that im happy to see that the staff is actively reading reports bc usually when people get reported in games nothing ever happens. :)
however, it says one day ban and im not sure if that means come 12:00 AM ill be unbanned or if its a 24 hour ban that will last exactly 24 hours and i think it should be specified more clearly on the menu.

item.title: Banning and Punishment
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
It’s exactly 24 hours from when you were issued the ban

Read full topic

item.title: Banning and Punishment

item.description:
I believe a countdown timer is planned for this.

Read full topic
